Reviews.Title: “Bumps in the night”
Reviews.Author: Foodtripper101
Reviews.Content: 3rd italian city spring found hotel hotel appartment choices hotel bathroom tiny 2 toilet bowls facing separated inch space shower sliding door incomplete beds comfortable middle night awakened 25 am sounded heavy furniture dragged stay night breakfast ok breads hams cereal wifi advertised free meant 2 hours staff understand english friendly establishments

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel!”
Reviews.Author: mgr89
Reviews.Content: hotel nice train station mestre train venice 20 minutes costs 1 euro train takes 10 minutes centre venice location hotel clean everyday clean towels bedding etc double bed nice balkony breakfast morning nice coffee capucino bread yoghurt juice de orange croissant etc staff friendly tried help altough english recommend hotel visit venice

HotelInfo.Name: Trieste Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Via Trento 2, 30174 Venice, Italy
